channel.title: Hybrid pvp help
channel.description:
The source of Hyrbid pvp is working for me , I guess.
but if I start up the client and want to login, it says : wrong username and password.
How to login?
I'm using port 43595 , im not sure I changed this in the client folder. I did it in client.java
have I to change it in more files?
ty

item.title: Hybrid pvp help
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

if I press ctr+F and search for 127.0 or 0.0.0

it don’t find anything.

and in the character folder is nothing, have I still to delete it?

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrid pvp help
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

possible solutions:
go into client.java and make sure the ip is 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0
go delete the char folder in data

Read full topic
